about_the_game:
See some of the behind-the-scenes work, drafts, and revisions that went into designing Chess of Blades! The artbook features 50 pages showing the process of designing and creating the art assets as well as some audio bloopers from the voice actors.

Features:
  • 50 pages
  • Audio Bloopers
  • Trivia and discussion on the evolution of the design
  • Bloopers only properly play in Adobe Reader or a similar PDF reader!

Instructions:
  • Right click Chess of Blades (must be installed) in your Steam Library and select "Properties".
  • Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse Local Files”.
  • Open "artbook.pdf" in the main folder.

NOTE: Bloopers only properly play in Adobe Reader or a similar PDF reader!
